extendedIngredients.name: rhubarb
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 cups diced fresh or frozen rhubarb

recipes.title: Rhubarb Ketchup
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Place pickling spice on a double thickness of cheesecloth. Gather corners of cloth to enclose seasoning; tie securely with string. Add to saucepan. Cook 1 hour or until thickened.                                                                                           Discard spice bag. Cool ketchup. Store in airtight containers in the refrigerator.                                        Yield: 6-7 cups.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Rhubarb Ketchup in  Bountiful Harvest Cookbook1994, p92                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             2 tablespoons equals 43 calories, trace fat (trace saturated fat), 0 cholesterol, 122 mg sodium, 11 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, trace protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients.
Place pickling spice on a double thickness of cheesecloth. Gather corners of cloth to enclose seasoning; tie securely with string.
Add to saucepan. Cook 1 hour or until thickened.
Discard spice bag. Cool ketchup. Store in airtight containers in the refrigerator.
